revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: An inquiry into the original of our ideas of beauty and virtue; in two treatises. I. Concerning beauty, order, harmony, design. II. Concerning moral good and evil...."
revision.text: Possibly: An inquiry into the original of our ideas of beauty and virtue; in two treatises. I. Concerning beauty, order, harmony, design. II. Concerning moral good and evil. The fourth edition, corrected. [By Francis Hutcheson]. (London : printed for D.Midwinter, A.Bettesworth and C.Hitch [and 9 others], 1738). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1301510~S1
